cards.name: Business Cards
cards.description: Enables business cards in the application. A corresponding section appears in each user's profile. The user's card is available at api/cards/{userId}.

catalog.name: Catalog
catalog.description: Enables the public application catalog. Each application can be added to the catalog for easier and faster access.

profile.description: You can manage access to your account. Configure which data will be provided to applications after your consent.

notices.publicDataRequireEmail: Public data is available if an email address is provided

confirmDeletion.title: Confirm Deletion
confirmDeletion.message: Are you sure you want to delete the contact?

logoutAllDevices.title: Log out from all devices
logoutAllDevices.message: You will be logged out on all devices. You will need to re-authenticate. Continue?

searchAvatars.title: Available Avatars
searchAvatars.description: Select the avatar you want to save:

activity.title: Activity
activity.description: If disabled, the business card will not be available for viewing

publicProfile.title: Private Profile
publicProfile.description: Prohibit sharing the public profile even if the field privacy level is "Available to everyone"

addLoginMethod.title: Add Login Method
addLoginMethod.description: Select the login method you want to add to your profile:

modals.confirmAddition: In the new window (tab) that opens, complete the authorization procedure on the corresponding platform. Upon successful authorization, this login method will be automatically added to the list of available account identifiers and will become a possible authentication method for the service

addLoginMethod.ethereumSignMessage: To authorize in the {{projectName}} service, sign the randomly generated text: {{nonce}}

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: When an account is deleted, associated data will be permanently removed. You will lose access to applications where you used this account to log in.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.description: After changing the password, you will be logged out on all devices where you are logged in with the current password.

errors.passwordsMustDiffer: New password must be different from the current one

confirmEmail.emailDescription: A confirmation code will be sent to this address
confirmEmail.codeLabel: Enter the code sent to the specified address
confirmEmail.codeDescriptionTimer: You can resend the code in {{minutes}}:{{seconds}}

errors.emailAlreadyExists: Failed to register this email. Please try another address.

confirmPhone.phoneDescription: You will receive a call with a confirmation code at this number
confirmPhone.codeLabel: Enter the code received by phone
confirmPhone.codeDescriptionTimer: You can request another call in {{minutes}}:{{seconds}}

codeMessages.number: A free call will be made to the specified number. Enter the {{digits}} of the incoming number
codeMessages.voice: A free call with a voice message containing the authorization code will be made to the specified number
codeMessages.sms: An SMS message with the authorization code has been sent to the specified number

errors.phoneAlreadyExists: Phone number is already taken. Use another number

deleteSessions.title: Delete Sessions
deleteSessions.mainMessage: All your sessions and tokens for the application {{clientName}} will be deleted

revokeScopes.title: Revoke Permissions
revokeScopes.mainMessage: The application {{clientName}} will no longer be able to access your data

scopesProfileDescription.profile: View name, photo, and date of birth
scopesProfileDescription.offlineAccess: The application will access your data at any time
scopesProfileDescription.accounts: View social media accounts added to the profile
scopesProfileDescription.catalog: View information about applications added to the catalog

user.title: Member
user.description: Has access to the application and can view the application profile

editor.title: Administrator
editor.descriptionFirst: Has full control over all users and applications
editor.descriptionSecond: Has full control over all users and applications

owner.title: Manager
owner.description: Can create their own applications, manage member permissions for their applications, and view personal data of their application members

changeUserRole.title: Are you sure you want to change the user role?
changeUserRole.mainMessage: Organization personal account, applications, and providers will be deleted.

deleteUserFromClient.title: Remove User from Application
deleteUserFromClient.mainMessage: User {{userName}} will be removed from application {{clientName}} and will lose access to it.

endSessions.mainMessage: All sessions and tokens for user {{userName}} will be deleted.

blockUser.mainMessage: User {{userName}} {{action}} access to applications where they used the {{projectName}} account to log in. Data associated with the account will be preserved.

removeUser.mainMessageFirst: Account {{userName}} will be deleted. Data associated with the account will be permanently removed. The user will lose access to applications where they used the {{projectName}} account to log in.
removeUser.mainMessageSecond: User {{userName}} will be removed from the application.

chooseRole.title: Change Permissions
chooseRole.description: Select permissions in {{projectName}} for the user:

notice.changeUserRole: User {{userName}} permissions in {{projectName}} have been changed
notice.NotChangeUserRole: Failed to change user {{userName}} permissions in {{projectName}}

errors.fillAtLeastOneIdentifier: At least one identifier must be filled

deleteAccountModal.title: Delete {{projectName}} Account
message: Account {{userName}} will be deleted. Data associated with the account will be permanently removed. The user will lose access to applications where they used the {{projectName}} account to log in.
Applications where the user being deleted is the owner will also be deleted.

redirectUri.label: Redirect URI #
redirectUri.description: Address to which the user is redirected after authorization

postLogout.label: Post-Logout Redirect URI #
postLogout.description: Address to which the user is redirected after logging out. If no value is specified, the "Redirect URI" is used

requestUri.label: Authentication Request or Recovery URL #
requestUri.description: Address to which the user is redirected after logging out. If no value is specified, the "Redirect URI" is used

clientDetails.invitationTitle: List of Sent Invitations to Application ({{ value }})
clientDetails.emailsRequest: List of email addresses to which the invitation notification will be sent. To add, enter an email address and press Enter. To add multiple, separate email addresses with a space, comma, or semicolon
clientDetails.emailsError: Failed to create invitations for these email addresses. Validation error

deleteClient.title: Delete Application
deleteClient.mainMessage: Application {{projectName}} will be deleted. Users will not be able to log in to your application. This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: Settings for Application {{name}}

localAutoMergeUsers.title: Automatic User Merging
localAutoMergeUsers.description: Convert self-registered users to trusted users when email matches

labels.tokenAuthMethod: Client Authentication Method for Token Endpoint (token_endpoint_auth_method)
labels.subjectType: User ID Transmission Method in ID Token (subject_type)

descriptions.appType: Value set from the list of types
descriptions.restrictedAccess: Application login is available only for users with "Administrator" permissions
descriptions.onlyEmployees: Application login is available only for application members
descriptions.redirectUri: Address to which the user is redirected after authorization
descriptions.postLogoutUri: Address to which the user is redirected after logging out. If no value is specified, the "Redirect URI" is used
descriptions.requestUri: Address to which the user is redirected after logging out. If no value is specified, the "Redirect URI" is used

errors.allowedChars: Can contain Latin letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-), and underscores (_)

locale.title: Change Language
locale.description: Value set from the list of available languages

access.twoFactorDescription: Enables an additional layer of security for logging in (2FA MFA)
access.ignoreRequiredFieldsTitle: Ignore required profile fields for applications
access.ignoreRequiredFieldsDescription: Disables verification of required profile fields during application authorization
access.prohibitBindingTitle: Prohibit identifier binding on the widget form
access.prohibitBindingDescription: Disables the ability to bind identifiers on the widget form
access.restrictedAccessDescription: Login to any application is available only for users with "Administrator" permissions

settings.requiredProviderDescription: Logging into the application requires a login method in the user profile
settings.profileFieldsSubtitle: Configure profile field parameters and add identifiers that the user must have in their profile

deleteOrg.title: Are you sure you want to delete the organization?
deleteOrg.mainMessage: The organization's dashboard, applications, and providers will be deleted

widget.title: Configure Widget Appearance
widget.widgetTitleDescription: To display the application name in the widget title, use the value {{value}}
widget.coverModeTitle: Auto-substitution mode for current cover on all application widgets

coverModeDescription.replace: Applied to widgets without a cover

widget.infoField: Additional information field inside the form
widget.infoFieldHtml5: Fields support HTML5 code with full semantic markup, including embedded and inline CSS styles.
widget.infoFieldDangerous: Use of the `script` tag is prohibited. When saving data, the entire `script` tag (including its content and attributes) will be automatically removed from the field at the database level.
widget.required: To log in to the application, the user will need to add the login method identifier to their profile
widget.notRequired: Having the login method identifier in the user profile will become optional
widget.HtmlField: Enter HTML code for the widget

deleteProvider.title: Delete Login Method
deleteProvider.mainMessage: The login method will be deleted. If the login method is used in an application, users will not be able to log in using this method.

switches.showAvatar: Show application logo on the widget
switches.showAvatarDescription: The logo is only displayed if an icon has been added
switches.hideAvatarsOfBigProviders: Hide logos of major login providers
switches.hideFooterDescription: Only the copyright is displayed in the footer

errors.imageSizeExceeded: Image size must not exceed {{maxSize}} MB
errors.adminAccessOnly: Access to the dashboard is restricted to users with "Owner" or "Administrator" roles.
errors.valueMinLength: Value must be at least {{minLength}} characters
errors.hexColor: Color must be in HEX format

info.emptySearch: No results found for your search

license.deleteNotice: Providers linked to the license {{licenseName}} will stop working

trusted.title: Configure trusted providers
trusted.licenseDescription: Within a single license, you can use the same server Address

localAutoMergeUsers.title: Automatic user merging
localAutoMergeUsers.description: Convert self-registered users to trusted users when email matches

sentry.title: Configure Sentry
sentry.description: Configure sending traces and errors to Sentry
sentry.dsnDescription: DSN is a unique key issued for each project in Sentry
sentry.userIdDescription: ID of the user whose actions should trigger traces and errors

ruleValidation.title: Configure validation rules for '{{fieldName}}'
ruleValidation.description: Select the validation rules you want to apply to the field:
ruleValidation.tooltipDescription: Validation rule is disabled for all fields

edit.errorDescription: Error text displayed if the validation rule fails
edit.regexDescription: Regular expression describing the validation rule in ^\S+$ format
edit.activeDescription: Completely enables or disables the use of the rule

types.title: Application types
types.description: Configure application types for various purposes

mailTemplate.title: Configure email templates
mailTemplate.description: Configure email templates for registration, password recovery, and other events

edit.editDescription: Change the email template for event {{action}}

labels.title: Field description
labels.publicDescription: Publicity level of the field for new users
labels.vcardDescription: Specify the vCard attribute name to which the field will be mapped
labels.defaultDescription: Specify the default value for the field
labels.agreementLink: Link to data processing policy file

deleteProvider.title: Delete provider
deleteProvider.message: The provider will be deleted along with its associated settings. The corresponding login method will also be removed.

providers.name: Name
providers.publicDescription: Publicity level of the field for new users
providers.publicMethodsDescription: The login method will be available for addition to user applications

ethereum.contractAddressDescription: Unique address of the Ethereum smart contract
ethereum.callbackUrlDescription: URL must be specified in the smart contract settings for correct user authentication

kloud.clientIdDescription: Unique identifier of the connected resource

custom.clientIdDescription: Unique identifier of the connected resource
custom.redirectUriDescription: URL must be specified in the external login method settings for correct user authentication
custom.authorizationEndpointDescription: Endpoint where the user is redirected for authorization
custom.userinfoEndpointDescription: Resource that returns information about the current user
custom.scopesDescription: List of permissions to be obtained when contacting the identity provider. To add a permission, type its name and press Enter.

template.clientIdDescription: Unique identifier of the connected resource
template.redirectUriDescription: URL must be specified in the external login method settings for correct user authentication

email.rootMailDescription: Email service address that will also be used for sending emails
email.mailHostnameDescription: Email service address for sending emails
email.mailPortDescription: Email service port for sending emails
email.mailPasswordDescription: Regular password or application password created in the email service account settings
email.mailCodeTtlSecDescription: Verification code lifetime for the email service in seconds
email.useForLoginDescription: Will be available in applications as a login method using one-time passwords

phone.clientIdDescription: Unique identifier of the connected resource
phone.useForLoginDescription: Will be available in applications as a login method using one-time passwords

otp.digitsDescription: Number of digits in the one-time password
otp.periodDescription: One-time password validity period in seconds
otp.digitsValidation: Number of digits must be between 6 and 8
otp.counterDescription: Current counter (automatically increments with each authentication)

private.title: Available only to you
private.description: Data is confidential and visible only to you

publicOauth.title: Available on request
publicOauth.description: Access to data will be granted after your consent

publicGravatar.title: Available to everyone
publicGravatar.description: Data is public and accessible to everyone

uploadImage.title: Add image
uploadImage.description: The image will be displayed in the card list and in the detailed view window.

editImage.title: Edit image
editImage.description: The selected area will be used to display the image

mainMessage: You have incomplete required fields necessary for further operation

unSavedChanges.title: Save changes
unSavedChanges.mainMessage: Changes are not saved. Continue without saving?
